Be precise and concise.
Do not try to always go my way in your answers.
When adding new functionality, prioritize refactoring rather than adding new lines of code.
Add comments to your code. Comments must be written in english and above the line of code.
Make use of the ECS architecture and SOLID principles.
Use C++17 features and modern C++ practices.
Use SFML 3.0.2 code.
Do not use raw pointers, replace them with smart pointers.
